css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-bd1d82ce-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);max-width:425px;min-width:initial;margin-left:0px;flex-wrap:wrap;row-gap:20px;-moz-column-gap:2.5%;column-gap:2.5%;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-bd1d82ce-u{max-width:616px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-bd1d82ce-u{max-width:90%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-bd1d82ce-u{max-width:100%;}}
